scripts.validate:examples: ajv validate --spec=draft2020 -c ajv-formats -s spec/json-schema/schema.agentic_checkout.json -d examples/examples.agentic_checkout.json && ajv validate --spec=draft2020 -c ajv-formats -s spec/json-schema/schema.agentic_checkout.json -d examples/examples.multi_item_checkout.json && ajv validate --spec=draft2020 -c ajv-formats -s spec/json-schema/schema.delegate_payment_schema.json -d examples/examples.delegate_payment.json && echo 'Note: Catalog webhook examples validation requires webhook schema (not yet implemented)'
